message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $13,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $11,500 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $12,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,750. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
